question:
Which of the following statements is/are true regarding Clarion- Clipper ton Zone (CCZ)?
  1. It is an area in the Eastern Atlantic Ocean
  2. All of the potential polymetallic nodules are in this region
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
Statement 1 is incorrect: It is an area in the Eastern Pacific Ocean bounded by the Clarion Fracture Zone to the north and the Clipper ton Fracture Zone to the south.
Statement 2 is correct: All of the potential polymetallic nodule exploration contracts that have been granted in the Pacific are in this region. It is also called the Clarion- Clipper ton Zone. There are four major areas of manganese nodules worldwide, the largest being the Clarion- Clipper ton Zone (CCZ), which is in the Pacific Ocean in an area equivalent to the size of Europe.
